name: Entangl
long_description:
Entangl is automating hardware design end-to-end without errors. Currently, our AI agent automatically detects errors in hardware design as engineering teams work. For each error detected, Entangl also suggests a detailed step-by-step solution. 

We are also actively training our next AI agent that can autonomously implement solutions (think code completion but for hardware).

Errors being caught too late are the number one reason that engineering projects get delayed by detecting them instantly, projects move faster.
one_liner: Automating hardware design end-to-end without errors
